configJson.description:
JSON file with application configuration.
Parameters values from json file are overwritten by values provided at command line.
Type: string

configDumpJson.description:
Name of the JSON file used for configuration dump
Type: string

dataFile.description:
Comma separated list of input files.
Type: string

resourcesPath.description:
Global path to the resources directory.
Type: string

frameLoadRange.description:
Number of GRAW frames searched for ASAD fragments for given event.
Type: int

singleAsadGrawFile.description:
Switch defining whether there are many files for single event.
Type: bool

updateInterval.description:
GUI update interval in online mode. Units are ms.
Type: int

zLogScale.description:
Z axis mode for 2D charge display.
Type: bool

autoZoom.description:
Switch for automatic zoom in on charge deposit in 2D charge display.
Type: bool

recoMode.description:
Switch for enabling algorithmic track reconstruction in GUI mode.
Type: bool

remove.description:
Switch controling pedestal removal.
Type: bool

minPedestalCell.description:
Pedestal time cell range - minimal value.
Type: int

maxPedestalCell.description:
Pedestal time cell range - maximal value.
Type: int

minSignalCell.description:
Signal time cell range - minimal value.
Type: int

maxSignalCell.description:
Signal time cell range - maximal value.
Type: int

recoClusterEnable.description:
Display reconstructed hit positions on 2D charge maps in GUI.
Type: bool

recoClusterThreshold.description:
Charge threshold for hits displayed in 2D charge map in GUI.
Type: double

recoClusterDeltaStrips.description:
Strip range of hits added to cluster around hits passing threshold value.
Type: int

recoClusterDeltaTimeCells.description:
Time bin range of hits added to cluster around hits passing threshold value.
Type: int

enabled.description:
Flag enabling event filtering.
Type: bool

maxChargeUpperBound.description:
Upper charge threshold to accept an event.
Type: double

minChargeUpperBound.description:
Lower charge threshold to accept an event.
Type: double

totalChargeLowerBound.description:
Lower threshold on total charge sum to accept an event.
Type: double

totalChargeUpperBound.description:
Upper threshold on total charge sum to accept an event.
Type: double

events.description:
NOT IMPLEMENTED. Event numbers list.
Type: vector<int>

energy.description:
LAB gamma beam energy [MeV].
Type: double
